data.actual_result: You are redirected to the company page with an invalid jump link
data.expected_result: You should be redirected to the jobs page.
data.short_description: [Website Bug] The jobs link at the bottom of the support page redirects to the company page rather than the Jobs page
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to support(dot)discordapp(dot)com - Scroll down to the bottom - Click Jobs
